 NFCgate v1.0
You are using a Broadcom BCM20793 chip, which has some known problems. We are using a workaround to avoid some of these, but this has some side effects. Do you want to read more?
To use this application, you need to enable your NFC chip. If you want, we can take you directly to the settings.
Enter the IP where the NFCGate Server application will be running
Enter the default port for the NFCGate Server application (usually 5566)
Sets the device into Reader Mode, which disables Android Beam. However, this also prevents the phone from working as a Card Emulator.
Show a small window where all NFC traffic will be logged to
For some cards, a workaround is required. This setting hides the warning message on this topic
